DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if ruboxistaurin can help slow the worsening of an eye disease called macular edema in patients with diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Reduction in the Occurrence of Center-Involved Diabetic Macular Edema
DOC.criteria: Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes 18 years or older Nonclinically significant diabetic macular edema Mild to moderate diabetic retinopathy in the study eye, vitreous hemorrhage in the study eye Relatively good vision (20/30 or better) Surgery or laser treatment in the study eye Glaucoma in the study eye Glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1c) greater than 11%, or systolic blood pressure greater than 170 millimeters of mercury (mmHg) Liver disease, dialysis or renal transplant
